name: Tetris - Narcisist Edition
description:
description:

I was playing tetris and noticed a distinct lack of my face, i found this unacceptable so I did the the only rational thing and wasted 2 weeks of my life programing tetris with my face plastered everywhere.

additional info:

  As of right now the game is only playable on browser on PC. I might add files to download for android in the future.

controls:

left/right- move left/right

down - drop

up - spin

c - hold
